itemDisplayName: SAS 9.4 and Viya Quickstart Template for Azure
description: The SAS® 9.4 and Viya Quickstart Template for Azure deploys these products on the cloud: SAS® Enterprise BI Server 9.4, SAS® Enterprise Miner 15.1, SAS® Enterprise Guide 8.2 for SAS® 9.4 and SAS® Visual Analytics 8.5 on Linux, SAS® Visual Statistics 8.5 on Linux, and SAS® Visual Data Mining and Machine Learning 8.5 on Linux for SAS® Viya. This Quickstart is a reference architecture for users who want to deploy the combination of SAS® 9.4 and SAS® Viya platform, using microservices and other cloud-friendly technologies. By deploying the SAS® platform on Azure, you get SAS® 9.4 analytics, data visualization capabilities in an Azure-validated environment. You get an integrated environment of SAS® 9.4 and SAS® Viya environments so you can take advantage of both worlds.SAS® Viya is a cloud-enabled, in-memory analytics engine. It uses elastic, scalable, and fault-tolerant processing to address complex analytical challenges. SAS® Viya provides faster processing for analytics by using a standardized code base that supports programming in SAS®, Python, R, Java, and Lua. It also supports cloud, on-premises, or hybrid environments and deploys seamlessly to any infrastructure or application ecosystem.
summary: This Quickstart is a reference architecture for users who want to deploy the combination of SAS® 9.4 and SAS® Viya platform, using microservices and other cloud-friendly technologies.
